description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the win32k elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30087):

1. Navigate to the Windows Update section in your settings.
2. Check for updates and install the KB5039211, KB5039212, or KB5039213 updates depending on your version of Windows.
3. Restart your system to apply the updates.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses the improper input validation vulnerability in the win32k component.
- Ensure your system is running an up-to-date version of Windows to reduce security risks.
- For manual installation, download the appropriate update packages from: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211), [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212), or [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213).
